website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ MS521 business projector is light enough to carry easily, at 5.1 pounds, and it offers a bright, high-quality data image at a native SVGA (800 by 600) resolution.
pros: Lamp life rated at up to 10,000 hours
cons: Sometimes has trouble synching correctly when switching between image sources

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually write reviews, but felt the urge to review this project. I bought mine in 2014 and it still runs like it did when I bought it and I know I have exceeded the 10,000 hour life span on the bulb. Use a lot for gaming with Xbox One also for watching TV and Movies. Definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a great Projector for a reasonable price. Edit: Still going strong 3 years after purchase. Just now getting a warning about the headlamp coming up on time to replace. But still works fine. It has been used a lot for gaming, TV, and movies. Fully recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteKnight540

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our church and it works great! It is bright enough to be seen clearly for at least 60-70 feet. For the price you can't beat it. I would recommend it for any small to medium size church. It works great even in bright lighting.
customer_reviews.author: jokerjonj

customer_reviews.title: Its resolutions are pretty good. Images are very bright even with room ...
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this projector. My daughters use it to watch movies. My husband uses it to give presentations. Its resolutions are pretty good. Images are very bright even with room lights on.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: So far the projector is working great. We are using it for our new children's program at church. It is easy to use and very high quality for a budget projector. Big fan of the BenQ brand so far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: The Very best Projector money can buy...
customer_reviews.text: The Very best Projector money can buy....and the quality in dim light is awesome! I was able to get it to 120" and could have made it larger if my awl was bigger
customer_reviews.author: J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the $
customer_reviews.text: The projector arrived on time, and the people that I have dealt with we're friendly, curdiest , & professional. The machine checks out as described as said on add. It has a beautiful 1080 picture, simple to setup & I put it on a shelf pointing at the opposite wall with no screen in a small bed room and I have a picture that is about 4ft by 12 ft that will compete with my 47 in LG HD 1080 LED TV. I love it and at $266 makes it even better. I do still have. To figure out what 3D glasses to use. It didn't come with any.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice crisp picture.... quiet fan.... shopped around before purchase did my homework... love this projector
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Young

customer_reviews.title: liked it so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: the first one we bought got hit by lightning and I liked it so much we got a second one , very good for church settings.
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Myanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! Arrived the very next day. I am very pleased with this. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: barbara whalen

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard movie night - have used it twice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for backyard movie night - have used it twice now and have it all dialed in - can't wait to take it RV-ing

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excelent equipment, it is exactly like in a picture and it arrived in few days. Without problems

customer_reviews.title: Really love it. Shows great picture even in well lighted ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased projector for church. Really love it. Shows great picture even in well lighted areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great picture couldn't ask for better hd, better than my flat screen
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I received the item within a larger box so that protected the original projector box. I've already used it several times and it is awesome. I was expecting the lowest "bulb use" to be a low light but it actually is very bright, to the point where I haven't had to have the windows covered to see the image. One thing that was not mentioned was that it does include a regular length SVGA cable, but that's not a bad thing. Definitely suggest it as an economic but completely equipped projector.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R. Waguespack

customer_reviews.title: The projector is nice, work good we love it
customer_reviews.text: The projector is nice, work good we love it.,perfect for our family's to watching movies and slide shows thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Arniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Very Clear and vivid Picture. Using it in our Bar to show Games, Our You tube Videos, and our Karaoke Words. A big hit to all of our customers. Very easy to set up. We have a 10'x8' Screen we painted with a high Quality white Paint.
customer_reviews.author: Edith B.

customer_reviews.title: Office best choice
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price ! Mac compatible easy to handle we use it for presentations and works great everywhere , it should come with a carring case
customer_reviews.author: federico

customer_reviews.title: Had to be sent in for waranty repair.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it at Christmas. Watched 10 movies with it and the lamp would no longer illuminate. BenQ authorized a warranty repair which cost me $17 in shipping and insurance. Well see.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture and Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so the kids and I could watch movies outside this summer. It is a great picture, sounds good and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding projector - it's sturdy, has outstanding features and was an excellent buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Have it now for a few months and working great, use it in my basement man cave
customer_reviews.text: Have it now for a few months and working great, use it in my basement man cave, other people gave advice to paint wall, tried this and didn't care for picture quality, purchased 100" electric projector screen for $84 also on amazon. The picture looked 10x better, highly recommend buying screen with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility LCD Projector!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to increase our stock of projectors used for leadership programs and conventions. It worked flawlessly for 4 days straight at 15 hours a day. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: What a great projector!
customer_reviews.text: great price - great projector - awesome picture! BenQ really knows color and quality and the value of a great image! very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kohler

product_meta.title: BenQ MS521 SVGA 3000L HDMI Smart Eco 3D Projector with 10,000 Hour Lamp Life Projector
product_meta.description:
The perfect choice to deliver stunning images and lower total cost of ownership.View larger SmartEco lamp saving technology offers great energy savings and delivers amazing quality.View larger THE BEST VALUE CHOICE FOR A SMALL-MEDIUM SPACE
Featuring a SVGA resolution, a brightness of 3000 ANSI lumens, a contrast ratio of 13,000:1, and an unbelievable lamp life of up to 10,000 hours, the MS521 is the perfect projector choice for your everyday life. Whether it's in business, education, or at home, the MS521 delivers stunning images and lower total cost of ownership.

SMARTECO LAMP SAVING TECHNOLOGY
Incorporating BenQ's renowned SmartEco Lamp Saving Technology, the MS521 not only offers greater energy savings to you, but continues to deliver amazing picture quality through this innovative technology. The SmartEco mode is designed to use only the exact amount of lamp power a projector needs to deliver the best contrast performance. With this feature, schools get to provide students and teachers uncompromised projection quality and reduce the total cost of ownership by extending the lamp life and lowering power consumption. Within the SmartEco Lamp Saving Technology umbrella, Lamp Care mode takes your dollars further by offering an astonishing lamp life of up to 10,000 hours.

3D BLU-RAY READY PROJECTION
MS521 is equipped with 3D Blu-Ray ready projection technology to bring you the same amazing 3D effects you get in 3D movies. Offered for no added cost, the 3D feature on 3D Blu-Ray ready BenQ projectors gives your audience an immersive real-life experience. Get ready to experience 3D like you've never seen it before.

TECHNOLOGY FOR LONGER BULB LIFE
There will be times when a projector is turned on without a display source, such as a classroom PC or notebook. To avoid a projector from running with full lamp power, BenQ created the No Source Detected feature to lower the projector lamp brightness to 30% after the projector has remained unconnected to a display source for more than three minutes. When inactive, the MS521 keeps power consumption to a minimum of 0.5W standby power further lowering your total cost of ownership.

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Projection System: DLP 
 * Native Resolution: SVGA (800 x 600) 
 * Brightness: 3000AL 
 * Contrast Ratio: 13,000:1 
 * Display Color: 1.07 Billion Colors 
 * Lens: F=2.5-2.7, f=22.08-24.28mm 
 * Aspect Ratio: Native 4:3 (5 aspect ratio selectable) 
 * Throw Ratio: 1.97-2.17 (50"@2m) 
 * Image Size (Diagonal): 34"-300" 
 * Zoom Ratio: 1.1:1 
 * Lamp Type: 190W 
 * Keystone Adjustment: 1D, Vertical ± 40 degrees 
 * Projection Offset: 130% ±5% 
 * Resolution Support: VGA (640 x 480) to UXGA (1600 x 1200) 
 * Horizontal Frequency: 15-102KHz 
 * Vertical Scan Rate: 23-120Hz

VERSATILE INPUT AND OUTPUT TERMINALS
The MS521 comes loaded with a versatile array of inputs and outputs to connect your devices. The MS521 includes HDMI connection, mini-jack Audio In and Out, S-Video, RCA Video Out, D-sub 15-pin inputs and monitor out, RS232 for control systems, and Mini-B USB.
